Text: Works great.
Thanks for the upload..  Does anyone know how dynamic progress works?   seems like it just puts you at your level but asks you to do quest that you cant get cuz you havent done the prior quests
You can go into the settings and click on the Dynamic progress tab. Then select skip impossible steps. This will ensure you are not doing quests that required a prior step to do.

This definitely works but I'm having a lot of issues (non torrent or uploader related) with zygor since the shattering. Questgivers don't have the quests that Zygor claims they should, or don't have any quests at all. I've updated many times, tried multiple torrents, have dynamic progressed turned on with no luck. I've used Zygor for quite a while so I don't think it's user error.  Anyone else having these issues?
Having said that thank you so much to the uploader that shared with us so quickly. =)

@adsza You dont know the difference between wows version and addons versions, this is 2.0.1521 of the addon, updated for wow 4.0.3a, the guide you refer to is an old guide for 3.3.X

This isn't updating for me for some reason It shows the 4.0 version of the game not the guide
I have v2.0.1468 what Am I doing wrong?!!?!

Those of you that are starting this guide with pre-existing characters there will be some difficulty with getting the guide matched up to what you are currently doing.  This main problem is the guide will most likely suggest quests that you haven't done pre-reqs for.  You will have to be patient and wait for future versions of the guide to fix this.  There are about 10,000 new quests since the shattering and we haven't figured out every quest chain in the game.
